fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- Attack someone at night.
- Split the universe in half. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Splitting the universe in half lets you create subgames. You select who goes in which, but there are only as many subgames as there were previously (times 2, or defaults to 2 if not used previously). There must be an even amount of players in each subgame.
- Every time someone is hanged, you gain a use of splitting the universe. The subgame where someone was hanged doesn't matter.
- There are no limitations on how you can move players around.
- Each subgame acts as its own game until the universe is split again.
